name: Lilith&Gabriel(NSFW)
description:
A short story game that takes 5 to 10 minutes to play through.
It is just a prequel to the main game Tale of Eros.

Nice artistic work and a good sex animation

Overview:
In the middle of an ancient war, a story of true love flourished between an angel and a demoness. A pure soul, a deep lust, and a legacy that had to be hidden.
